name: Jq-cling
tagline: An android like ClingView for jquery
body: ### Welcome to JQ-Cling. This plugin attempts to recreate the Android ClingView in jQuery and JQM. ### What's the "ClingView" The ClingView is this overlay you get when you first start your device or a new app which acts as an in context help to guide the user. It looks like this in its native state: ![cling view](http://i.stack.imgur.com/1FUCi.png) ### usage ``` $('#cling-this').cling({ title:"My title", description:"The html description" }); ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
